title: Add -project flag to tk create with inheritance
description:
Add -project flag to create command in cmd/create.go.

Implementation:
1. Add -project string flag
2. If -project specified, use it
3. If -project NOT specified AND -parent specified:
   - Load parent tick
   - Inherit parent's project if set
4. If neither, no project

Test cases:
- Create with explicit project
- Create without project  
- Create child that inherits parent project
- Create child that overrides parent project
acceptance_criteria: Flag works, inheritance logic correct, tests pass
